title: Rolwaling Valley Trek
short_description: Trek to the base of the worldâ€™s highest mountain.
long_description: This is a 12-day trek to Everest Base Camp...
what_to_expect: Scenic flights, Sherpa villages, mountain views.

itinerary.title: Day 1: Arrival in Kathmandu
itinerary.description: Arrive in Kathmandu and transfer to the hotel. Rest and prepare for the trek.

itinerary.title: Day 2: Fly to Lukla and trek to Phakding
itinerary.description: Take an early morning flight to Lukla and trek to Phakding, a small Sherpa village.

itinerary.title: Day 3: Trek to Namche Bazaar
itinerary.description: Continue trekking through the Sagarmatha National Park to Namche Bazaar.
